Currently he runs a brokerage consultancy firm and is a valuable member of the FTC team. Author: Agozyen
Title: [ANN] FinTech Coins (FTC) - Second Presale Is Now On (16/02/2018 -18/04/2018)
Body: Feathercoin's symbol is FTC.  If you don't think people are going to be confused buy this then you need to take a step back.  NO exchanges will list two coins with the same symbol.  All this will do is cause confusion.  The last thing you want to do is to let the exchanges determine their own designation for the coin.   And FTC has it's own blockchain, FinTech Coin is a token based on the Ethereum blockchain.  People in the Feathercoin communuity call it FTC.
